Author:
chcorbato This class encapsulates all the methods and objects that are needed in the action part of OMRosAPI

public void setReconfigurationTask(java.util.Set<ReconfigurationCommand> a)
method to set a new reconfiguration task (goal?) for the manager. It creates an executor for each command

a - the set of commands for the reconfiguration

processFeedback

public ActionFeedback processFeedback(org.ros.message.OMRosDrivers_py.MetaActionResult message)
Redirects the feedback to be processed by the corresponding executor where the processing of the feedback may cause new actions to be executed

Parameters:
message -
Returns:
the feedback produced by the ros msg. It can be null if none

simulateFeedback

public void simulateFeedback()
auxiliar method used by RosTaskExecutor to send a feedback for actions that are not commanded to meta_actuator_node
